thread.title: Ralph Franceschini

author: Ralph Franceschini
title: Ralph Franceschini
text: I am purchasing more of the MR 16 12 volt landscape bulbs...I replaced the halogen bulbs for energy savings and these LED bulbs give out more light, perfect color (same as the incandescent halogens) for a fraction of the energy costs. I am buying more as gifts for hard to shop for family members. This is a perfect gift!!! The site is easy to navigate and check out is a breeze. I am a frequent shopper here.
